title: Sterling Pull-Down Kitchen Faucet in Stainless Steel
description: Influenced by industrial design and professional kitchens, The Sterling Collection by VIGO is home to an artistic pull-down kitchen faucet. Inspired by the elegance of jewelry and medallions, this kitchen faucet features a premium stainless steel hardware finish. Curved corners on the high arch deliver a sleek silhouette and provide plenty of space for washing or filling large pots and pans. Its modern yet timeless design pairs perfectly with any stainless steel or farmhouse kitchen sink. With a simple 10-minute installation process, you can easily upgrade your kitchen workstation.PERFORMANCE SPOUT: eco-friendly 1.2 GPM and WaterSense certified spout conserves water by 20% and reduces your water bill without sacrificing performanceETERNAL SEAL: ceramic disc cartridge continually prevents leaks and dripsFINISH PLATED: 7-layer coated finish ensures that the hardware finish is consistent throughout the entire product for a lifetime of brilliance1, 2, 3, or 4-HOLE INSTALLATION: deck plate and soap dispenser are available for purchase separately to accommodate multiple sink or countertop setups without the use of puttySINGLE HANDLE LEVER: smart handle design moves 90° forward to accommodate tighter spaces and delicate backsplashesDIY INSTALLATION: all parts, hardware, and user-friendly instructions support easy installation in just 10 minutesRUST RESISTANT: premium finish is resistant to rust, corrosion, tarnish, and fingerprintsEASY TO CLEAN: high-quality spot-resistant finish is easy to wipe cleanINCOMPARABLE CONSTRUCTION: solid brass construction delivers a lifetime of unmatched durabilityCONTEMPORARY DESIGN: stylish faucet complements any kitchen sink and home designOPTIMAL MANEUVERABILITY: 360-degree rotation allows the sprayer to function as a pot-fillerFLEXIBLE HOSE: nylon braided pull-down hose extends up to 30 inchesLIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: All VIGO kitchen faucets feature a quality-assured Limited Lifetime Warranty

title: Single-Handle Pull-Down Sprayer Kitchen Faucet with Touchless Sensor in Chrome
description: The VIGO Edison Pull-Down Kitchen Faucet delivers powerful performance paired with elegant industrial style, now with advanced touchless technology for a more hygienic and convenient kitchen experience. Details Crafted from solid brass and finished in VIGO’s premium chrome, the Edison Touchless Kitchen Faucet is built for durability and lasting shine. Its motion-activated sensor starts and stops water flow with a simple wave of the hand—perfect for reducing contact with germs and streamlining everyday tasks. The sleek high arc coil protects the pull-down hose, providing flexibility and reach while enhancing the faucet’s modern appearance. The faucet includes an automatic shut-off feature that stops water flow after 3 minutes of inactivity, conserving water and protecting your kitchen from potential leaks or overflow. Details Constructed from durable solid brass and finished in rust-resistant stainless steel, this faucet features VIGO’s exclusive Duo-Spout Flow™ system, allowing smooth switching between a steady stream from the high-arc spout and a powerful spray from the pull-out side sprayer—all with a single handle. The high-arc main spout offers ample vertical clearance for tall pots and pitchers, while the 360° swivel design provides complete sink access. The pull-out sprayer, equipped with ergonomic push-button control, delivers a powerful stream perfect for rinsing dishes and produce. Thanks to the DockLock™ system, the sprayer remains securely docked when not in use. The faucet’s Finish Plated™ multi-layered coating resists fingerprints, scratches, and stains, maintaining a like-new appearance with minimal maintenance. An Eternal Seal™ ceramic disc cartridge, tested for over 500,000 uses, ensures smooth, drip-free operation for years. Engineered with Self-Cleaning Spout technology, the faucet resists mineral buildup to deliver reliable performance. Featuring a water-efficient 1.8 GPM flow rate, this kitchen faucet meets WaterSense and California Energy Commission standards, reducing water usage by up to 40% without compromising performance. Specs Flow Rate: 1.8 GPM (WaterSense & CEC Certified) Material: Solid Brass Finish: Stainless Steel (multi-layered Finish Plated™ coating) Control: Single-handle for both main faucet and side sprayer Installation: Widespread, fits 2 standard 1 3/8” diameter openings Main Spout: High-arc with 360° swivel Sprayer: Pull-out side sprayer with DockLock™ and push-button control Cartridge: Sedal ceramic disc (Eternal Seal™), tested for 500,000 uses Features: Duo-Spout Flow™, Self-Cleaning Spout, Splash-Free Aerator Connections: Standard US 3/8” plumbing Installation: EZ Install™ design with all hardware included Certifications: IAPMO Certified, WaterSense, CEC Compliant Warranty: VIGO Limited Lifetime

title: Cass Two-Handle Widespread Bridge Kitchen Faucet with Side Sprayer in Chrome

Diamond knurling detailing on the knob handles and side sprayer adds a unique touch of chic charm to your kitchen layout. Crafted from solid brass, this faucet offers a classic design with modern functionality, creating an enduring centerpiece in your bathroom. Details The VIGO Noma Single Hole Bathroom Faucet is built to withstand the test of time. Its solid brass construction ensures durability, while the design remains simple yet elegant, ideal for any modern bathroom. The faucet’s unique materials resist rust, corrosion, and tarnishing, keeping it looking new for years. With a single lever for both water flow and temperature control, the faucet offers ease of use and reliability. Its easy installation, high-quality components, and thermostable metal braided PEX lines make it a breeze to set up and maintain. The Noma faucet is tested to exceed industry standards, making it a trusted addition to your home. A matching pop-up drain is available for a complete set. title: Paloma Single Hole Bathroom Faucet In Brushed Nickel
description: The VIGO Paloma Single Hole Bathroom Faucet combines beauty with function, adding a graceful touch to your bathroom sink. Details Sculpted with flowing curves and a unique trough spout, the VIGO Paloma faucet creates a visually stunning and soothing cascading water flow. Designed with solid brass and finished in brushed nickel, this faucet is not only beautiful but also highly durable, resisting corrosion and tarnishing. The single-handle design offers easy water and temperature control, while the Sedal ceramic disc valve ensures a drip-free experience, tested for up to 500,000 uses. The faucet’s 1.2 GPM flow rate meets WaterSense standards for water conservation, and its nozzle resists mineral buildup for easy maintenance and long-lasting clarity. Perfect for single-hole installation, this faucet includes all necessary mounting hardware and waterlines for a seamless setup.
